FuncDef: The slot command displays the specified slot view.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board. Only the slot ID of an existing interface board is displayed.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the slot view, the observing interface can be configured for an entire interface board.
Precautions
A slot view cannot be manually deleted after being created.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
